Text: tnx for uploading the whole dvd item. um, can you upload some james cagney films (whole dvd item)? i'd be glas to see those :))

um, like "Lady Killer" (1933), G-Men (1935), "The Strawberry Blonde" (1941), "Captains of the Clouds" (1942), "The Doorway to Hell" (1930), "Taxi" (1932). Those james cagney films are very hard to find here around the net especially in ISO'S or DVD-R'S. I have been looking for those for a long time :))
or some non-cagney films such as "He Walked By Night" (1948), "The Big Clock" (1948)
